Package nzilbb.ag.util

Class SimpleTokenizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • nzilbb.ag.util.SimpleTokenizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Function<Graph,​Graph>, UnaryOperator<Graph>, GraphTransformer
    public class SimpleTokenizer
extends Object
implements GraphTransformer
    Transformer that breaks annotation labels on one layer (e.g. utterance) into token annotations on another layer (e.g. word), based on a character delimiter (space by default).

    Can also be used to split annotations on the same source layer - e.g. to split CLAN linkages like B_B_C into three words B B C, by setting tokensInSourceLayer to true.

    Author:
    Robert Fromont robert@fromont.net.nz
